text:
Tigerspike| Senior iOS Engineer| FULL TIME | LONDON onsite with some remote working possible|https://tigerspike.com/

Tigerspike is a Digital Products company with a mission to 'Improve people's lives through technology'. We have 10 offices across 4 continents, each creating web & mobile (consumer & enterprise) apps for a range of industries, with clients such as Emirates, New Look, The UN & Westfield.

We're growing and now looking for a Senior iOS Engineer (Swift, of course) to join our team. There are opportunities to enhance your skills, work with new tech and work in one of our other offices around the world.

Drop me an email if you'd like more info: michelle.coulson@tigerspike.com
